propositions.text: Mirror of Love: A story of emotional entanglement between one girl and two boys
Initial encounter marks the beginning of a complex relationship
Campus life introduces the protagonist to contrasting personalities of twin brothers
Emotional conflicts arise from differing interactions with Gu Han and Gu Ye
Deepening emotional bonds lead to confusion and struggle over feelings
Revelation of hidden truths about family connections complicates relationships
Final decision to leave reflects on the nature of love and personal growth
Themes of love, choice, and identity are central to the narrative
Love as a mirror reflecting personal desires and insecurities
Choice as a dilemma between warmth and mystery
Identity tied to past connections and self-discovery

concepts.name: Love
concepts.context: Central theme involving emotional entanglement and romantic tension

concepts.name: Choice
concepts.context: Protagonist's struggle to choose between two contrasting personalities

concepts.name: Identity
concepts.context: Revelation of hidden family ties and personal background

concepts.name: Contrast
concepts.context: Personality differences between Gu Han (warmth) and Gu Ye (coldness)

concepts.name: Separation
concepts.context: Final decision to leave and start anew

hierarchy.structure: The document follows a linear narrative structure with six chapters and an epilogue, detailing the protagonist's journey from encounter to separation, focusing on emotional and relational development.
